content.en: Algorithmic Vibration Control: Researchers have been investigating the use of algorithms to improve active vibration control in various structural systems. These algorithms, such as the filtered-X LMS algorithm and the linear quadratic Gaussian approach, have shown promising results in minimizing vibration and improving control performance. Additionally, new adaptive algorithms and hybrid control algorithms have been proposed to effectively suppress vibration and control parameter-varying systems. These advancements in algorithmic control methods have the potential to greatly enhance active vibration control in a wide range of applications.
content.da: Algoritmisk vibrationskontrol: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre aktiv vibrationskontrol i forskellige strukturelle systemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom den filtrerede-X LMS algoritme og den lineære kvadratisk-Gaussiske tilgang, har vist lovende resultater i at minimere vibrationer og forbedre kontrolpræstationen. Desuden er nye adaptive algoritmer og hybride kontrolalgoritmer blevet foreslået for effektivt at undertrykke vibrationer og kontrollere parameter-varyerende systemer. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmisk kontrolmetoder har potentialet til i høj grad at forbedre aktiv vibrationskontrol i en bred vifte af anvendelser.
